text:
Message 3458 of 4024
I do appreciate you think that you are unilaterally in charge of the universe and make all the laws. And I do know you tell me what to do. All the time.
You even speak for me. A real talent of yours.
I am asking how we handle the fact that the kids and I should stay close while you globetrotting. You get that, right? So I am asking how we do that
together. It is our joint responsibility to them as parents.
How can I do that without cramping your style but still assuring we have an equal relationship. And assure your family is not defaming me in front of
them like your mom did last year with me to you. That’s all.
Sent:07/05/2024 at 07:48 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/06/2024 at 05:47 AM)
Subject:Re: Communicating as You Take the Boys from Me All Summer
Message 3459 of 4024
Ok... you disagree.
Did it get wrapped up or not? There is your answer.
Are you right or wrong now?
Sent:07/05/2024 at 07:49 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/06/2024 at 05:44 AM)
Subject:Re: ToDo List
Message 3460 of 4024
Any ideas on next steps? As noted today, your whole summer disregards the expert advice we got, so I’m hoping we get moving soon for the kids sake.
BTW- I am not holding you responsible for her pace (unless you are low-key stalling) but at this rate a lot of additional damage is going to be done to
them.
What do you think of the books?
Sent:07/05/2024 at 08:14 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/06/2024 at 05:44 AM)
Subject:Reunification
Message 3461 of 4024
I just wanted to let you know I’m trying my best. I realize you’re up there at Whistler trying to re-create what I did with the boys and your family last
year.
You won’t
Sent:07/06/2024 at 01:34 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 07/06/2024 at 05:43 AM)
Subject:Fake History
